history.narrative: Law 7-78 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-179, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 27, 1987 and November 10, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 24, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-113 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
